page.title: 05CLUBS
page.content: IN{LUTHRIE}AND{MOONZIE}THE{S.W.R.I. HAS A FEW LOCAL MEMBERS. IT MEETS IN LUTHRIE HALL MONTHLY. THERE IS A CHAIRMAN AND A COMMITTEE.ACTIVITIES INCLUDE{ARTS,CRAFTS,BAKING {DEMONSTRATIONS,TALKS}AND{PARTIES. THE{MENS CLUB}WHICH ALSO MEETS IN {LUTHRIE VILLAGE HALL}WAS ESTABLISHED IN 1958.IT IS RUN BY A COMMITTEE ELECTED ANNUALLY.THE ACTIVITIES INCLUDE{DOMINOES,DARTS,TABLE {TENNIS,CARPET BOWLS}AND{BILLIARDS.}IT MEETS IN THE WINTER. IN{LUTHRIE}THE {WOMEN'S GUILD,}WITH 22 MEMBERS,MEETS ONCE A MONTH.THEY HAVE DEMONSTRATIONS, PRAYERS AND INVITE SPEAKERS.THERE IS A COMMITTEE.MOST OF THE MEMBERS ARE NOT LOCAL.EVERY TUESDAY THE CHILDREN OF{CREICH SCHOOL}GO TO{SCOTTISH {COUNTRY DANCE}CLASS.THEY DANCE AT {FESTIVALS AND PARTIES}TO ENTERTAIN PARENTS AND THEMSELVES.
